entry.title: Blown away by the success of the 1st three lessons of our @ArweaveEco course with @ar_io_network... 5,763 quiz completions 🤯 That's a lot of new �...
entry.summary:
Blown away by the success of the 1st three lessons of our @ArweaveEco course with @ar_io_network... 5,763 quiz completions 🤯 That's a lot of new 🐘's ready-to-build on the permaweb. More coming soon... Let us know your feedback so far in the replies 👇
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 📡 We're live! Arweave 101 - Building Apps on Arweave. For the last month, @K4y1s has been working on a comprehensive @ArweaveEco course with @ar_io_network. Today, we're excited to launch the 1st three lessons and @zealy_io quests to earn XP with @ar_io_network 👇
